Name: Man 2
About the game: Join Man as he fights lawyers, bad guys and invaders to protect his loved ones. This is a 3D fighting game with a 3D environment. This game features non-stop action with different game modes. Instant Action mode features standard, state of the art, 1v1 fights. Extra matches mode features 1v1 fights as well. The story mode has platforming segments as well as collectibles. There are additional features including an adrenaline meter which enables special attacks for some characters. This game has fun and laughs for everyone.
